speakers.title: Babylon to Beijing: Risks and Rewards of Global Dominance
speakers.speaker: Amy Chua
speakers.text: Amy Chua joined the Yale faculty in 2001 after teaching at Duke Law School. Prior to starting her teaching career, she was a corporate law associate at Cleary, Gottlieb, Steen & Hamilton. Her expertise is in international business transactions, law and development, ethnic conflict, and globalization and the law.
